version_description: Improved performance
Improved performance
This update includes minor stability and performance improvements.
This update includes minor stability and performance improvements.
This update includes support for Apple WatchKit apps as well as minor stability and performance improvements.
This update includes support for Apple WatchKit apps as well as minor stability and performance improvements.

This update adds support for testing upcoming iOS 9 features — including watchOS 2 apps and App Thinning. 

Testers can now choose how to receive update notifications for each app they are testing. Also, watchOS 2 beta apps will install automatically when the "Automatic Downloads" setting is turned on in the Apple Watch app. 

Minor stability and performance improvements.

This update adds support for testing upcoming iOS 9 features — including watchOS 2 apps and App Thinning. 

Testers can now choose how to receive update notifications for each app they are testing. Also, watchOS 2 beta apps will install automatically when the "Automatic Downloads" setting is turned on in the Apple Watch app. 

Minor stability and performance improvements.

TestFlight now supports internal testing for tvOS apps and adds the ability for testers to accept beta invitations with redemption codes. The redemption code is found via a link within the invitation email and redeemed by entering the code in the TestFlight app. 

Minor stability and performance improvements.

TestFlight now supports internal testing for tvOS apps and adds the ability for testers to accept beta invitations with redemption codes. The redemption code is found via a link within the invitation email and redeemed by entering the code in the TestFlight app. 

Minor stability and performance improvements.
Includes a fix for an accessibility issue as well as minor stability and performance improvements.
Includes a fix for an accessibility issue as well as minor stability and performance improvements.
Includes support for watchOS 2.2 and iOS 9.3, as well as minor stability and performance improvements.
Includes support for watchOS 2.2 and iOS 9.3, as well as minor stability and performance improvements.

Includes more robust support for installing watchOS beta apps and a fix for when copies of the same devices are being displayed on the settings screen.  

Minor stability and performance improvements.

Includes more robust support for installing watchOS beta apps and a fix for when copies of the same devices are being displayed on the settings screen.  

Minor stability and performance improvements.
Minor stability and performance improvements
Minor stability and performance improvements

• Fixed issues around installing iMessage apps and improved error messages for iMessage app updates.
• Fixed an issue that prevented users from canceling an incomplete installation.

• Fixed issues around installing iMessage apps and improved error messages for iMessage app updates.
• Fixed an issue that prevented users from canceling an incomplete installation.
• Fixed an issue with push notifications on iOS 10. After updating to version 1.4.3, testers will need to restart their iOS devices for push notifications to start working again.
• Fixed an issue with push notifications on iOS 10. After updating to version 1.4.3, testers will need to restart their iOS devices for push notifications to start working again.

• Developers now have the ability to make multiple builds of the same app available for testing — as a tester, you can find these additional builds in the new “Previous Builds” section for an app.
• Apps with no builds to test will no longer appear in the TestFlight app.

• Developers now have the ability to make multiple builds of the same app available for testing — as a tester, you can find these additional builds in the new “Previous Builds” section for an app.
• Apps with no builds to test will no longer appear in the TestFlight app.
Added compatibility for iOS 11 beta.
Added compatibility for iOS 11 beta.

• This update includes a redesigned user interface for iOS 11
• The app list displays apps currently being tested, previously tested apps (including expired and removed apps), and apps that are incompatible for the device being used
• A new welcome screen appears when opening the TestFlight for the first time after updating
• You can now use 3D Touch on the TestFlight app icon to redeem a code or update all apps
• Split view is supported

• This update includes a redesigned user interface for iOS 11
• The app list displays apps currently being tested, previously tested apps (including expired and removed apps), and apps that are incompatible for the device being used
• A new welcome screen appears when opening the TestFlight for the first time after updating
• You can now use 3D Touch on the TestFlight app icon to redeem a code or update all apps
• Split view is supported
提高了稳定性，并修复了错误。
提高了稳定性，并修复了错误。

• 支持“深色”模式，适用于弱光环境（要求 iOS 13）。
• 稳定性提升和错误修复。

• 支持 iOS 13 上的应用和功能。
• 新增隐私信息。
• 新增本地化内容。
• 稳定性提升和错误修复。

- 增加了本地化内容。
- 内容会显示在搜索栏。
- 改进了文字对齐和浏览功能。
- 修复了在 iPad 上导致奔溃的问题。
- 提高了稳定性，并修复了错误。
• Improved the user experience of following a public link and of updating the TestFlight app.

- 新增支持 38 种语言。
- 现支持"动态字体"。
- 改进了辅助功能。

• This update includes support for Smart Invert Colors and a revised 3D Touch peek view that includes “What to Test”.
• The cellular data limit is now 150MB, increased from 100MB.
• Small bug fixes and other UI improvements were made.

This update includes minor stability and performance improvements.
This update includes minor stability and performance improvements.

- Fixed an issue where entering a redemption code while running iOS 9.3.2 would sometimes cause TestFlight to crash.
- Other bug fixes and stability improvements were made.

- Fixed an issue where entering a redemption code while running iOS 9.3.2 would sometimes cause TestFlight to crash.
- Other bug fixes and stability improvements were made.
